problem_text_cn: 如图所示,以三角形的三个顶点为圆心1为半径画三个扇形(图中阴影部分),则这三个扇形面积之和为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, draw three sectors with the three vertices of the triangle as the center N_0 as the radius (the shaded part in the figure), then the sum of the area of ​​the three sectors is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵三个扇形(图中阴影部分)的圆心角的和为180°,∴三个扇形面积之和=\frac{180\cdotπ\cdot1^{2}}{360}=\frac{1}{2}π．故选:C．
